about_the_game:
Desert Dungeons is an open-world experience where you are the newest recruit at the Coral Springs Adventurer's Guild. Explore the vast Holokai Desert, delve into dungeons and clear them of monsters, gear up to take on new challenges and become the best Adventurer!

- Explore the Holokai Desert and discover over 30 different locations of interest!
- Delve into 5 different dungeons, each with unique challeneges and monsters, to prove your skill!
- Gear up through exploration and crafting to overcome new challenges!
- Become the best Adventurer!
detailed_description:
Desert Dungeons is an open-world experience where you are the newest recruit at the Coral Springs Adventurer's Guild. Explore the vast Holokai Desert, delve into dungeons and clear them of monsters, gear up to take on new challenges and become the best Adventurer!

- Explore the Holokai Desert and discover over 30 different locations of interest!
- Delve into 5 different dungeons, each with unique challeneges and monsters, to prove your skill!
- Gear up through exploration and crafting to overcome new challenges!
- Become the best Adventurer!
name: Desert Dungeons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: x64 architecture
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Old laptop gpu or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: As the newest recruit to the Coral Springs Adventurer's Guild, you'll have to gear up, explore the Holokai desert, and delve into the dungeons located there to become the best Adventurer!
